name: BattleHunters (BattleHunters)
description:
Description of the game : A battle royale to have fun with your friends and more ... Season 1 of Chapter 1 takes place on the planet MARS! Invite your friends to "Steam" and compete against them! The particularity of this game is to personalize your sessions! Maximum number of people in a group: "50 players".

Enjoy !

Our social networks :

- Twitter (EN) : https://twitter.com/BattleHuntersEN

- Twitter (FR) : https://twitter.com/BattleHuntersFR

"This is a "TEST" version of the game"!
